subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pedro Alvarez gave Pittsburgh a lead that host St. Louis could not match in a game that lasted 6 hours 7 minutes, the longest game in the majors this season. Each team used eight pitchers.
snippet: Pedro Alvarez gave Pittsburgh a lead that host St. Louis could not match in a game that lasted 6 hours 7 minutes, the longest game in the majors this season. Each team used eight pitchers.
